```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test Coverage.")
```



```{r }
A <- matrix(
  data = 1:10,
  ncol = 2
)
test_that("nonsquare matrix", {
  expect_false(
    is_sqr(A)
  )
  expect_false(
    is_posdef(A)
  )
  expect_false(
    is_inv(A)
  )
  expect_false(
    is_diag(A)
  )
  expect_error(
    low2sym(A)
  )
  expect_error(
    up2sym(A)
  )
  expect_error(
    ones(dim(A)[1], dim(A)[2])
  )
  expect_error(
    ones_from(A)
  )
})
B <- matrix(
  data = "text",
  nrow = 2,
  ncol = 2
)
test_that("nonnumeric", {
  expect_error(
    is_sqr(B)
  )
})
C <- 1:10
test_that("vector", {
  expect_error(
    is_sqr(C)
  )
})
D <- matrix(
  data = c(1, 2, 2, 1),
  ncol = 2
)
v <- c(1, 2)
test_that("cor2cov - is_posdef", {
  expect_error(
    cor2cov(D, v)
  )
})
test_that("cov2cor - is_posdef", {
  expect_error(
    cov2cor(D)
  )
})
E <- matrix(
  data = c(
    1,
    .5,
    .5,
    1
  ),
  ncol = 2
)
u <- c(-1, 1)
test_that("cor2cov - v is positive", {
  expect_error(
    cor2cov(E, u)
  )
})
```
